verses.text: Ix yalan Jehová t'a winhaj Moisés chi' icha tik: --Tzach q'ueta t'a lum vitz b'aj ayinek' tik yet' winhaj Aarón, winhaj Nadab yet' winhaj Abiú yet' pax 70-oc eb' yichamtac vinaquil e chonhab'. Ha eb' chi' najatto skan eb' yaq'uem sb'a t'ayin.
Ha achxonhej syal a q'ueul t'a in tz'ey, haxo pax eb' winh chi', max yal-laj sq'ueta eb' winh yet' pax eb' chonhab' max yal-laj sq'ueta eb' ed'oc, xchi t'a winh.

Ixlajwi chi', ix emixta winhaj Moisés chi', ix yalan winh t'a eb' anima tas leyal ix yak' Jehová yet' tas ix yutej yalani. Axo masanil eb' anima chi', junnhej ix aj stak'vi eb'. --Masanil tas ix yal Jehová chi', ol co k'anab'ajej, xchi eb'.

Ixlajwi chi', ix stz'ib'an winhaj Moisés masanil tas ix yal Jehová. Axo ix sacb'inaj t'a junxo k'u, ix q'ue vaan winh, ix sb'oan jun altar winh t'a yich vitz chi', ix yak'anq'ue linhan lajchave' q'uen q'ueen winh. Ha junjun q'uen q'ueen chi', junjun makan yinhtilal Israel sch'ox q'ueen.

D'a elanhchamel ix schecan juntzanh eb' winh quelemtac vinac winhaj Moisés chi' yic smilan nok' toro eb' silab'oc yic stz'ha t'a smasanil yet' juntzanhxo silab' yic sch'oxan sjunk'olal eb' yet' Jehová.
Axo winhaj Moisés chi' ix chaan nanhal schiq'uil nok', ix yak'anem winh t'a yol juntzanh yet'tal, haxo nanhalxo, ix stzicanoch winh t'a altar chi'.

Ix yik'anq'ue winh b'aj tz'ib'ab'il strato Dios, ix yavtan winh t'a skal eb' chonhab'. Ixlajwi yavtan winh, ix yalan eb' chonhab' chi' icha tik: --Masanil tas syal Jehová, ol co k'anab'ajej, xchi eb'.

Ixlajwi chi', ix yik'ancot schiq'uil nok' winh, aton ix yak'canem winh t'a yol juntzanh yet'tal chi', ix stzicanb'at winh t'a yib'anh eb' anima chi'. Ix yalan winh icha tik: --Ha jun chik' tik sch'oxani to tz'ochcan yopisio jun strato Jehová ix sb'o qued'oc tik, aton masanil tas ix yal t'ayonh, xchi winh.
Ixlajwi chi', ix q'uex winh t'a lum vitzal Sinaí chi'. Ajun winhaj Aarón, winhaj Nadab, winhaj Abiú yet' pax 70 eb' yichamtac vinaquil chonhab' ix q'ue yet' winh.
Ata' ix yil sDiosal eb' winh. Ha t'a yalanh yoc, toxonhej scopopi icha q'uen zafiro te wach' yilji, icha syaxil satcha’anh.
Malaj tas ix utaj eb' winh yuj yipalil Dios. Ix yil Dios eb' winh, ix wa eb' winh, ix yuk'an ha' eb' winh t'a yichanh.

Ix yalan Jehová t'a winhaj Moisés chi' icha tik: --Q'ueanhcot t'a jolom vitz b'aj ayinek' tik, tza tanhvan ta', ata' ol vak' chab' q'uen q'ueen t'ayach, aton q'uen b'aj tz'ib'ab'iloch juntzanh checnab'il vuuj, yic tz'och e k'ayb'ub'aloc, xchi t'a winh.
Ix q'ue winhaj Moisés t'a lum vitz chi' yet' winhaj Josué winh skolwaj yet' winh.

Ayic manto b'atlaj winh, ix yalan winh t'a eb' yichamtac vinaquil chonhab' chi': --Cananhec t'a tik masanto ol onh emxuloc. Ayek' winhaj Aarón yet' winhaj Hur eyed'oc. Tato ay tas e gana sb'oi, a eb' winh tik ol b'oan t'ayex, xchi winhaj Moisés chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', ix q'ue eb' winh schavanhil. D'a elanhchamel ix och moynaj jun asun t'a lum vitz chi'.
Axo stziquiquial Jehová ix javi t'a yib'anh lum vitzal Sinaí chi', vaque' val k'ual ix och oyan asun t'a lu'um. Axo t'a yuquil k'ual ix avtajq'ue winhaj Moisés yuj Jehová t'a skal asun chi'.
Ix sch'ox sb'a stziquiquial Jehová t'a skal jun asun t'a lum vitz chi', t'a yichanh eb' chonhab'. Ha stziquiquial chi', lajan yilji icha junok k'ak' te ov stz'ab'at smasanil yuj.
Ixlajwi chi', ix b'at winhaj Moisés t'a skal jun asun chi'. Ix q'ue winh t'a slajvub'alxo sjolom lum vitz chi'. 40 k'ual yet' 40 ak'val ix kan winh ta'.
